short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nettoie les liens Moodle pour ouvrir dans un nouvel onglet proprement et ajoute un bouton de téléchargement vidéo Panopto.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Moodle & Panopto Helper - Enhance Your Learning Experience

Simplify your educational journey with Moodle & Panopto Helper, a powerful browser extension designed to streamline your online learning experience. Perfect for students and professionals at Technion and beyond, this tool helps you manage course links effortlessly and download video lectures with ease.

Key Features:

Clean Moodle Links: Automatically opens Moodle course links in clean, distraction-free tabs for better focus.
Panopto Video Downloader: Easily download Panopto videos in just one click — supports direct MP4 downloads to watch offline anytime.
Technion Integration: Built with Technion users in mind, integrating elements that match Technion’s environment and branding.
Simple & Intuitive: Designed with simplicity, this extension works seamlessly in the background, making your online learning smoother.
Whether you’re studying remotely or reviewing materials offline, Moodle & Panopto Helper empowers you to make the most of your learning platform.
